api_list.name: newsSiteid
api_list.description: end point for source of the articles
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news-nz.p.rapidapi.com/stuffnz"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-nz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://climate-news-nz.p.rapidapi.com/{newssiteid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-nz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
